The callback definition for the raw stream.

Parameters
[in]dataa pointer to the raw data.
[in]sizethe size of the array in bytes.
[in]timestampthe timestamp of the sample expressed in μs.

The depthsense_error_code enum.

Enumerator
depthsense_error_code_success 

the method returned with success.

depthsense_error_code_other_error 

the method returned with failure.

depthsense_error_code_invalid_handle 

the input handle is invalid.

depthsense_error_code_no_device_found 

no device was found.

Function Documentation

CDS_API depthsense_version depthsense_get_library_version ( )

Returns the version information of the C++ library.

This function returns the version information of the C++ library.

Returns
The version of the C++ library.
CDS_API depthsense_handle_t* depthsense_initialize ( )

Initializes DepthSenseSDK in client/server mode.

This function initializes a DepthSenseSDK context object in client/server mode and register the first depth node found.

Returns
A handle. The handle will be nullptr in case of failure.
See also
depthsense_shutdown(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
depthsense_initialize_standalone()
CDS_API depthsense_handle_t* depthsense_initialize_standalone ( )

Initializes DepthSenseSDK in standalone mode.

This function initializes a DepthSenseSDK context object in standalone mode and register the first depth node found. A standalone context guarantees that there is a single instance of DepthSenseSDK running.

Returns
A handle. The handle will be nullptr in case of failure.
See also
depthsense_shutdown(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
depthsense_initialize()
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_enable_raw_data_stream ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle,
raw_stream_callback_t  callback 
)

Enables the raw data stream.

This function enables the raw data stream for the selected device. The payload data received in the callback is valid only during the callback.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
[in]callbackA pointer to a raw stream handler.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_enable_confidence_stream ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle,
confidence_stream_callback_t  callback 
)

Enables the confidence stream.

This function enables the confidence stream for the selected device. The payload data received in the callback is valid only during the callback. In the case the depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame() has been called, the callback might not be triggered.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
[in]callbackA pointer to a confidence stream handler.
Returns
whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame(depthsense_handle_t* handle, int32_t payload_size)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_set_confidence_threshold ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle,
int16_t  confidence_threshold 
)

Set the confidence threshold for the selected device.

This function set the confidence threshold for the selected device. This method requires the device not to be controlled by any other DepthSenseSDK context.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
[in]confidence_thresholdThe confidence threshold.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_enable_depth_stream ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle,
depth_stream_callback_t  callback 
)

Enables the depth stream.

This function enables the depth stream for the selected device. The payload data received in the callback is valid only during the callback. In the case the depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame() has been called, the callback might not be triggered.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
[in]callbackA pointer to a depth stream handler.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame(depthsense_handle_t* handle, int32_t payload_size)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_enable_vertices_floating_point_stream ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle,
vertices_floating_point_stream_callback_t  callback 
)

Enables the vertices floating point stream.

This function enables the vertices floating point stream for the selected device. The payload data received in the callback is valid only during the callback. In the case the depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame() has been called, the callback might not be triggered.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
[in]callbackA pointer to a vertices floating point stream handler.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame(depthsense_handle_t* handle, int32_t payload_size)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_start ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle)

Starts the stream.

This function starts the stream and the main loop of DepthSenseSDK. This function is blocking and will be unblocked whenever depthsense_stop is called.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_stop(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_stop ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle)

Stops the stream.

This function stops the stream and exit the main loop of DepthSenseSDK.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_start(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_shutdown ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle)

Shutdown DepthSenseSDK.

This function releases the DepthSenseSDK context.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_initialize()
depthsense_initialize_standalone()
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_enable_auto_configuration ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle)

Enables the auto-configuration of the device.

This function set the DepthSense::DepthNode::DisableAutoConfiguration property to the desired state. When auto-configuration is enabled, DepthSenseSDK will automatically configure the device before starting to fetch the data and will shutdown the stream of the device when the stop function is called. This method requires the device not to be controlled by any other DepthSenseSDK context.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_start(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
depthsense_stop(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_disable_auto_configuration ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle)

Disables the auto-configuration of the device.

This function set the DepthSense::DepthNode::DisableAutoConfiguration property to the desired state. When auto-configuration is disabled, DepthSenseSDK will not configure the device before starting to fetch the data and will not shutdown the stream of the device when the stop function is called. This method requires the device not to be controlled by any other DepthSenseSDK context.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_start(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
depthsense_stop(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
CDS_API depthsense_error_code depthsense_set_raw_payload_size_per_frame ( depthsense_handle_t *  handle,
int32_t  payload_size 
)

Set the DepthSense::DepthNode::RawPayloadSizePerFrame property to the desired payload size.

This function set the DepthSense::DepthNode::RawPayloadSizePerFrame property to the desired payload size. This method requires the device not to be controlled by any other DepthSenseSDK context and the auto-configuration to be disabled. Setting the payload size will invalidate the current configuration and thus only the raw data stream will be available. Any other registered callback than the raw data stream handler won't be called.

Parameters
[in]handleA pointer to a depthsense_handle_t.
[in]payload_sizeThe payload size to be expected by the DepthSenseSDK backend.
Returns
Whether the call succeeded or not.
See also
depthsense_disable_auto_configuration(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
depthsense_enable_auto_configuration(depthsense_handle_t* handle)
depthsense_enable_confidence_stream(depthsense_handle_t* handle, confidence_stream_callback_t callback)
depthsense_enable_depth_stream(depthsense_handle_t* handle, depth_stream_callback_t callback)
depthsense_enable_vertices_floating_point_stream(depthsense_handle_t* handle, vertices_floating_point_stream_callback_t callback)
